Description: Flight into Egypt; St Joseph walking towards right, leading a donkey on which the Virgin is seated holding the sleeping Christ child in her arms, in a landscape with trees behind to right. c.1641 Etching
Producer name: Print made by: Stefano della Bella
Curator's comments: For comment see 1871,0513.34. This is a late impression after the removal of the address of Mariette and the privilege.
Acquisition notes: For the history of the albums see 1871,0429.53. This is one of the prints added to the albums by Sir Walter Calverley Trevelyan.
